name: luscious
description: A library of SASS mixins, functions, and variables to use in your front-end projects.
author: Yisrael Grimes <yisraelgrimes@gmail.com>

scripts.compile: yarn run lint && node-sass --include-path 'core' --include-path 'node_modules/modularscale-sass' --source-comments --output-style expanded scaffold/main.sass -o tmp/ && yarn run autoprefix
scripts.dev: yarn run compile && onchange 'core/**/*.s+(a|c)ss' 'scaffold/**/*.s+(a|c)ss' -- yarn run compile
scripts.compile:test: yarn run lint && node-sass --include-path 'core' --include-path 'node_modules/modularscale-sass' --include-path 'node_modules/sass-true/sass' --source-comments --output-style expanded --quiet test/test.sass -o test/ && yarn run autoprefix:test
scripts.test: yarn run compile:test && onchange 'test/**/*.s+(a|c)ss' -- yarn run compile:test
